response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your experience. Given its high-quality craftsmanship and unique features, we believe it's worth more than its face value. For this exceptional offering, I am proposing a special introductory price of $95. This is an exclusive opportunity to own a product that could potentially save you time, money, or simply add value to your life. I look forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 95}
